resources.string:
Do’s 
Try to post high resolution, clear and original photos. It is advisable to post a short video of less than 60 seconds. 
Provide authentic information for quicker and easier screening of the application. 
Treat this as an organic platform for adoption appeals. 
Check your ‘my posts’ page for the application status. 
Wishlist the dog you want to adopt by clicking on the dog icon image on the dog profile card Don’ts It isn’t a platform to buy or sell dogs - a strict NO for breeders It is not a dog medical treatment platform - don’t place requests that need immediate medical attention
